dc_title_s: Bridges, Area Features: Montgomery County, Maryland, 2015
dc_description_s: This is a feature class in the geodatabase Planimetric Mapping Features: Montgomery County, Maryland, 2015. The data set consists of bridge edges (sides or parapets), and the length to where the roadway begins. The data was developed as part of the planimetric mapping effort and was photogrammetrically captured from aerial photography. Attributes for the database include feature-ID's and the GeoMaP assigned feature code.11/10/2015: Entire countywide data updated by KUCERA INTERNATIONAL. Source date: 4/10/2014 imagery
dc_publisher_sm: The Maryland-National Capital Park and Planning Commission
